headline: EchoStar: AT&T Deal Pays Well, But Is Only Half The Story
summary: EchoStar Corporation's $22.65B spectrum sale to AT&T Inc. shifts industry dynamics, benefiting Verizon & T-Mobile. Click for more on SATS and T.

raw.headline: EchoStar: AT&T Deal Pays Well, But Is Only Half The Story

headline: EchoStar Surges On $23 Billion AT&T Spectrum Purchase. FCC Approval Needed.
summary: EchoStar stock surged and AT&T stock rose after AT&T said it will buy midband spectrum licenses from EchoStar for $23 billion.

raw.headline: EchoStar Surges On $23 Billion AT&T Spectrum Purchase. FCC Approval Needed.
raw.summary: EchoStar stock surged and AT&T stock rose after AT&T said it will buy midband spectrum licenses from EchoStar for $23 billion.

headline: Comcast Corporation (CMCSA) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to Comcast (CMCSA). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.

headline: Q2 Earnings Roundup: Comcast (NASDAQ:CMCSA) And The Rest Of The Wireless, Cable and Satellite Segment
summary: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q2 behind us, let’s have a look at Comcast (NASDAQ:CMCSA) and its peers.
